Claim: "The surface temperature stays at the freezing point until all the ice melts."
Implication: "If the ice-water mix is well-stirred, the surface temperature will stay at the freezing point."
Referring expressions: The surface temperature, freezing point, ice, melts  ice-water mix, surface temperature, freezing point.
Formula: (exists c (exists a (IsAtFreezingPoint(a) and IsMelted(c))) & (forall h (forall i (  IsMelted(h) ->   IsAtFreezingPoint(i))))) -> (exists e (exists f (IsWellStirred(e) and IsAtFreezingPoint(f))))
